title: Findstr option needed
body: Findstr needs an option to return the count-of-matches, like "FIND /C"

comments.body:
There's a way to find out the total matches... hold on *Notes rustling* (Seriously, I went through old papers)
findstr /R /N "^.*String.*$" File.txt | find /c ":" >>Temp.txt
Set /p Variable=<Temp.txt
will set the variable "Variable" to how many matches there were. (Or I think it does according to my notes)
